item.title: 930+Sqft Warm Apartment "FREE MONTH" $630-$670 - "PETS OK
item.address: 115 Carman Ave, Fredericton, NB, Canada, e3A 0e7
item.description: Address: 115 Carman Ave, Fredericton, NB, Canada, e3A 0e7 Cozy Sunrise Apartments, Beautiful Spacious 930+ Square-foot two Bedroom Beautiful Warm Apartment, Secured Very Quiet Mature Adult Building and Neighbourhood! Long-term Tenants, North-side Gibson Street, Bus route, Ample Parking, Powered car outlets, Coin Operated Washers and Dryers and across from walking trail. Available Now. The building also has an picnic table, old style swing and a shed for storage of a bike or two...Heat and Lights not included, Average power bill < less than $100 per month, FANTASTIC! - <br /> <br />Large room sizes are as follows: <br /> <br /> Living room:11' x 20' <br /> Master bedroom:15' x 11' <br /> First bedroom: 10' x 11' <br /> Storage Room: 6" x 8' <br /> <br />Kitchen with Dining area off the living room and lots of closet space with large utility room for storage.. <br /> <br />Driving is as follows: <br /> <br /> 1 minute local store <br /> 2 minutes Restaurants <br /> 3 minutes Tim Horton's, Dairy Queen, Pizza place, Dollar & Grocery stores <br /> 6 minutes Downtown King Street, Kings Place <br /> 7 minutes Atlantic Superstore <br /> 8 minutes Wal-Mart, Canadian Tire, Restaurants <br /> 9 minutes University of New Brunswick (UNB & STU) <br /> 10 minutes Fredericton Golf & Curling Club <br /> 10 minutes West Hills Golf Course <br /> 11 minutes Fredericton Mall <br /> <br />City Bus Stop is next door front of Dentist Office. <br /> <br />Note: Free month's rent takes effect when contract signed, therefore may consist partial month depending on your move-in date, we can talk about it. Only two units left ($630 & $670) all tenants are long term and the building is peaceful (quiet) with large rooms. Cable and Internet Ready!! This is across street to walking trails, and there is lots outdoor space to walk your pets and exercise! <br /> <br />In addition there is a "Gable Swing-set", "Picnic Table", with car plug-ins and parking is plowed and sanded as needed. Security Deposit is Required, non smoking building and on approved credit admittance will be granted. Contact 506-461-4648. New Flooring- <br /> <br />2 bedrooms average $760 - $1,400 in this beautiful city, today's offer, you can have the same for $630 to $670 with a "MONTH FREE!" Contact 461-4648. Thank You

item.title: Amazing and spacious top floor 2 bedroom close to everything!
item.address: 21 James Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K2P 0T
item.description: Address: 21 James Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K2P 0T This bright and charming recently renovated 2 bedroom suite is located only a few minutes from downtown. <br />Just Move-in, relax by the cozy fireplace and enjoy the gleaming and low maintenance wood and tile floors (say goodbye to your allergies). This spacious suite offers lots of closet/storage space (even a walk-in closet). <br />Enjoy cooking in your kitchen with self-clean oven and tiled counter under the skylight…. or having a BBQ in the back yard off your private deck and entrance. <br />326 Patton is located at the corner of Mona Avenue – just 1 block from Montreal road shopping, banking, restaurants/pubs and bus route #12, 5 and 14. <br />Close to everything and a walkscore of 87! <br />Downtown, uOttawa, Cité Collégiale, Montfort Hospital, beautiful Rideau river, Byward market, schools, parks and bike paths are only few minutes away. <br /> <br />Available immediately <br /> <br />The monthly rent includes heat, water & sewer, fridge and range with self-clean oven <br />- On-site Laundry <br />- On-site parking available <br />- First and last month rent required <br />- No smoking and/or dogs allowed in the building <br /> <br />For more details and to see other suites available please visit www.m2agroup.com <br />Please call 613-590-9509 (ext. 1) for more information or to schedule a viewing. <br />We are proud to provide quality housing to quality tenants!

item.title: Fully Furnished Modern 1bdrm / 1bath Condo in Royal Oak
item.address: 100 Chinook Winds Place, Airdrie, AB, Canada, T4B 4B
item.description: Address: 100 Chinook Winds Place, Airdrie, AB, Canada, T4B 4B Beautiful FULLY FURNISHED 2nd floor 1 bdrm / 1 bath condo for rent in the modern Red Haus condominium complex in Royal Oak. This modern unit boasts an open and spacious floor plan, and will be available fully furnished and move-in ready for your ease, March 1st, or if needed, within 15 days notice! <br /> <br />Details of the unit are as follows: <br /> <br />- Building was built in 2013 <br />- Spacious and open floor plan <br />- Beautiful granite countertop with backsplash kitchen <br />- Thick carpet in Living room, bedroom and walk through closet <br />- Modern dark tile flooring in kitchen and washroom <br />- High end ensuite Maytag Washer and Dryer set <br />- Modern, High end stainless steel kitchen appliances <br />- Walk though closet connecting Bedroom and Washroom <br />- Spacious balcony with gas line (BBQ Included!) <br />- Heated, secure underground parking stall <br />- Access to common Club House with gym, lounge, kitchen, sofas and pool table <br />- Full shopping center across the street from the property (Wal-Mart, Sobeys, Home Outfitters, London Drugs, Shoppers Drugmart, Banks, Restaurants, Coffee Shops) <br />- 2 separate Bus stops just steps away, and a short 5 minute bus ride to either <br />Crowfoot or Tuscany LRT c-train Stations <br />- Conveniently located just seconds from the ring road (Stoney Trail) <br /> <br />What’s included: <br /> <br />- Telus High Speed Internet (Internet 50), Telus Cable (Essentials + Sports package*), Heat, Water (*We can switch out the sports package to any telus package that you prefer) <br />- Full bedroom set: Queen size bed with comfortable memory foam mattress, and 4 under bed storage drawers, 2 side tables, a 4 drawer dresser and a mirror <br />- Beautiful 6 seat dining table set with addable insert to extend table length <br />- Comfortable bonded leather sofa with extra wide chaise <br />- 2 tower style bookshelves <br />- 60” Panasonic plasma television, wall mounted <br />- Apple TV, ZVOX Sound Box and a PS3 w games <br />- Master Forge 30 000 BTU 2 burner gas BBQ on balcony <br />- Utilities: Heat and Water covered, you’re responsible for electricity <br /> <br />Looking for 12 month lease, 6 months may be considered.

item.title: UP-SCALE DOWNTOWN WATERFRONT EXECUTIVE LUXURY FURNISHED CONDO!!!
item.address: 45 Charles St E, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4Y 1S2
item.description: Address: 45 Charles St E, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4Y 1S2 UP-SCALE WATERFRONT EXECUTIVE STUNNING BRIGHT LUXURY FURNISHED CONDO <br /> <br /> <br />AVAILABLE NOW !!! <br /> <br />LUXURY FURNISHED <br />DOWNTOWN TORONTO <br />EXECUTIVE STANDARDS <br />UP-SCALE CONDOMINIUM-TOWER <br />WATER-FRONT CONDOMINIUM SUITE <br />HIGH FLOOR WITH DIRECT LAKE VIEW <br /> <br /> <br />A HUGE SUITE WITH THE LIVING SPACE MUCH LARGER THAN MOST 1 or 1.5 BEDROOMS !!! <br /> <br />Newly renovated luxurious, bright and designer decorated luxury furnished studio-suite on VERY HIGH FLOOR with South-East view on downtown and waterfront, feature fully equipped kitchens & in suite laundry facilities. <br /> <br />The Suite is in a luxury condo building located right on waterline - just minutes away Union Station, Financial District, Eaton Center, Dundas Square, Ryerson University, University of Toronto, Queens Park, Toronto City Hall, Canon Theater, Massey Hall, CN Tower, Air Canada Center, Rogers Center, Princess of Whales Theater, are all main attractions of Downtown Toronto. Restaurant, bar and room service. item.title: WOW! Only $360 per bedroom in a great location.
item.address: 95 Barrette, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1L 8A
item.description: Address: 95 Barrette, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1L 8A Forget being stuck in traffic, wasting time or the high cost and zero privacy of a hi-rise apartment building, this place has it all at the right price. Just step outside for some fresh air on your private patio that’s just perfect for a summer BBQ <br /> <br />Relax by the cozy fireplace and enjoy this bright & charming suite with 9 foot ceilings only 3 kms east of downtown with a walkscore of 88. <br /> <br />This recently renovated main floor suite consists of 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, spacious eat-in kitchen, living room and dining room (which can be used as a 4th bedroom) and low maintenance hardwood and ceramic floors - great for allergies and extremely stylish...your furniture will look great!. Enjoy your private entrance and deck overseeing the side yard surrounded by a lovely tree edge. <br /> <br />Within 1 block from Montreal road shopping and bus route #12, 15 and 5. Close to schools and restaurants. Downtown, uOttawa, Cité Collégiale and beautiful Rideau River, parks and bike paths are only few minutes away. <br /> <br />Rent includes, Heat, Water & Sewer, 5 Appliances (Fridge, Range with self-clan oven, Dishwasher, Microwave Oven and Air Conditioner) <br /> <br />Available immediately <br />Mature & responsible students welcome. <br /> <br />This suite was recently renovated and occupied by 4 professional and mature students. Great opportunity to save by sharing costs ($360 per person based on 4 occupants) <br /> <br />Benefits: Large eat-in kitchen and bright spacious rooms with low maintenance floors. Laundry on same floor. Fenced yard, patio, garden, storage shed and high speed internet access ready. <br /> <br />Notes: <br /> <br />No smoking and/or dogs allowed in the building <br />First and last month required <br /> <br />For more details and to see other suites available please visit www.m2agroup.com <br />Please call 613-590-9509 (ext. 1) for more information or to schedule a viewing. <br />We are proud to provide quality housing to quality tenants!

item.title: Downtown,fully furnished, lowney,Griffintown,condo
item.address: 2859 TeRRASSe TRACY, LONGueuiL, QC, Canada, J4L 1T
item.description: Address: 2859 TeRRASSe TRACY, LONGueuiL, QC, Canada, J4L 1T Beautiful 1 bedroom condo with a garden view balcony ideally located at 950 Notre-Dame west on then 2dh floor of the Lowney 5-6-7, with fireplace. <br />Located Downtown Montreal, it is steps away from L'ETS (Ecole de technologie supérieure), Old Montreal, Lachine Canal, Place Bonaventure. Supermarket, Convenient store, Metro station, Bell Centre, etc... <br /> <br />The condo is FULLY furnished and includes all stainless steel appliances. Fridge, Stove, Microwave oven, dishwasher, washer BOSCH, dryer BOSCH, TV SONY, complete kitchen furniture, complete living room furniture, complete bedroom furniture, even sheets, towels, curtains, dishware, glassware, utensils. All you will need is your luggage to bring your clothes with you. <br />A storage unit (Locker) is included as well. <br />The building is very secure with increased security and the common areas include the urban chalet that has a fire place, there is a cinema room, an exterior pool on the rooftop, whirlpool, lounge chairs, BBQ, etc... <br />Inside there is a gym with great equipment as well as a sauna and lap pool. <br />If you would like to schedule a visit or have any questions, please call or text 514-827-4722 <br /> <br /> <br />Très beau condo avec un balcon donnant une vue sur le jardin situé idéalement au 950 rue Notre-Dame ouest au 2eme étage du Lowney 5-6-7, avec cheminée <br /> <br />Au centre-ville de Montréal . L'ETS (Ecole de technologie supérieure), du Centre-Ville de Montréal, du Vieux Montréal, du Canal Lachine et de la Place Bonaventure. Super Marché, Dépanneur, Station de Métro, Centre Bell, etc.... <br />Il y a une chambre fermée et le condo est completement meublé avec tous les éléctroménagers en acier inoxydable. Réfrigerateur, Four, Four micro-ondes, lave- vaiselle, laveuse, sécheuse, TV, set de table de cuisine, set de salon complet, air climatisé, set de chambre complet, y inclus les draps, serviettes,rideaux, Vaisselier, ustensils, vaisselle. Vous n'avez qu'à emmener votre linge dans vos valises. <br />Il y a aussi un espace de rangement (Locker). <br /> <br />L'édifice est super sécuritaire avec surveillance accrue et les aires communs incluent un chalet urbain avec un foyer, une salle de cinéma maison, une piscine extérieure sur le toit, bain tourbillon, chaises longues, BBQ, etc... <br />A l'intérieur il ya aussi un gym très bien équipé y inclus un sauna et un bassin de nage intérieur. <br /> <br />Pour faire une demande de visite ou si vous avez des questions, S.V.P

item.description: Address: 80 Wellesley Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4Y 1H Modern 1 Bedroom + Den, Bright & Spacious Condo (unfurnished) on 29th Floor available for rent from February 2016 with unobstructed breathtaking views and fantastic amenities in the heart of Lakeshore at Parklawn & Etobicoke. <br /> <br />The condo is located in popular ‘California Condos’ in the trend setting neighborhood of ‘Mystique Point’ of South Etobicoke by the Lake and just 10 minutes drive to Toronto downtown and 20 minutes to Mississauga downtown. <br /> <br />Enjoy Waterfront Living With All The Amenities Closeby. 24 Hrs Sobeys. Shopper's Drug Mart, Rabba, Starbucks, Lots Of Restaurants Within Walking Distance, Enjoy Barbecue And Biking By The Lake. <br /> <br />Access to the Gardiner Expressway, as well as the QEW, Hwy 427, Mimico GO station and TTC is always fast and easy. It is located steps from parks and bike trails. <br /> <br />****Extras*****1 underground parking space and 1 storage locker, Kitchen is with Granite Countertop, Laminate flooring, Soaker bathtub, Stainless steel appliances, Central air-conditioning, Custom-designed contemporary cabinets, Glass tiles backsplashes, Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher and Stacked washer/dryer. <br /> <br />This absolutely gorgeous modern luxury condo building has fabulous amenities: <br /> <br />Martini bar and dining room on 32nd with spectacular views of the lake. <br />Professional greenscaped gardens on 3-storey podium with courtyards <br />Indoor swimming pool / whirlpool & Sauna <br />2 Gyms. One on the sky deck level (32nd Floor) overlooking the lake and the second on 4th Floor. <br />Outdoor swimming pool and sundeck <br />Circuit training room <br />Party room on 32nd floor with a separate dining lounge and beautiful lake view. <br />Patios with gas bbq’s <br />Outdoor running track. <br />2 Indoor Squash Courts / 1 Indoor tennis court <br />Movie theatre / screening room, <br />Billiards Room / Cards Room / Reading Room / Crafts Room <br />Visitor Parking / Guest Suites / 24 hrs. Security / Concierge <br /> <br />Rent: $1499.00 plus hydro without parking / with parking $1550.00 <br /> <br />Locker Included <br /> <br />Pet friendly & absolutely no-smokers <br /> <br />If interested, please email at california.condos@hotmail.com or call / txt Kal at (647)206-1983 for further info and to view the unit. <br /> <br />Serious inquiries only.

item.title: *Old Montreal/Port* classy, best location, top notch building
item.address: 7843 Ave BODiNieR, MONTReAL ANJOu, QC, Canada, H1K1C2
item.description: Address: 7843 Ave BODiNieR, MONTReAL ANJOu, QC, Canada, H1K1C2 Hi there! My name is Martin (owner) and I've lived in this amazing apartment for 3 years. I absolutely love this apartment; the location can't be beat, the building is top notch, the other tenants are great people, and, last but certainly not least, the summers in Old Montreal/Port are truly unforgettable. And if I could stay, I would -- but I will be moving out end of February to pursue a dream opportunity. <br /> <br />Details outlined below -- thanks for your interest, happy hunting and good luck! <br /> <br />Martin <br />---------------------------------------------------------- <br />About the Location: <br />"Can't be beat!" <br />- Walk 1 min to: dry cleaners, depanneur/convenient store (which is awesome by the way!), metro (Champ des Mars), gym, take a walk on the old Montreal cobblestone streets (Rue Sainte Paul) <br />- Metro 1 stop away/Walk 5 mins to: China town, the grocery store (IGA), banks, central metro station (Berri-UQAM, yellow, green, orange line), watch the boats in old port (Saint-Laurent river), clock tower beach (with real sand in the Summer!), all types of restaurants, bars, and small boutiques <br />- Metro 10 mins to: corporate buildings on Rene levesque, McGill/Concordia, Plateau <br />- Special Events: 2 mins walk to Igloofest (JAN/FEB), 1 metro stop to Jazz fest (JUN) and Place-des-Arts museum, 20 mins metro to Osheaga (AUG) <br />- Noise: Very quiet (will not hear cars/events across the street) <br />- Neighborhood: Extremely safe and clean neighborhood (since it is a tourist area. . .so you get all the perks without the noise!) <br /> <br />About the Building/unit: <br />"Top notch!" <br />- High ceilings, wood floors, central heating, Juliet balcony, around 700 sq ft, true closed door bedroom, full bathroom <br />- Rooftop standing pool and lounge deck area. . .one of the best spots in Montreal to enjoy the summer fireworks every 10pm on Saturday <br />- Phone buzz to enter for guests <br />- Built in 2004 and renovated twice since then; building committee do a great job with the up keep <br />- Parking in the building available <br /> <br />Terms & Price: <br />- Monthly Rent: $1775 (furnished, negotiable), $1500 (unfurnished), <br />- Lease length: 12 months, 6-months (furnished only) <br />- Security deposit: $950 (to be returned after 3 months and replaced with a post-dated check) <br />- Monthly utilities: estimated $70 (not included) <br />- Cable/Internet: estimated $100 (not included) <br /> <br />About you: <br />You are a respectful and reasonable individual (or couple) that is capable of meeting rent requirements on time. Other than that. . .all are welcome! <br /> <br />Next steps: <br />- When can I move in?

item.address: 4660 Grand, Montreal, QC, Canada, H4B 2X
item.description: Address: 4660 Grand, Montreal, QC, Canada, H4B 2X <p>Situé au 3463, Sainte-Famille, nous offrons l’hébergement idéal pour les voyageurs d’agrément et d’affaires, seuls, en couple, ou en famille, désirant confort, intimité, autonomie et vivre au cœur du Quartier des spectacles et du centre-ville.</p><p>Tous nos studios (1 1/2), suites juniors (2 1/2) et appartements deux pièces (3 1/2) sont meublés avec une cuisinette et salle de bain équipées. Économisez sur les frais de restaurants en tirant avantage de nos cuisinettes entièrement équipées. En plus, vous êtes à deux pas de trois épiceries grande surface (Métro, Provigo et IGA).</p><p>SERVICES INCLUS DANS LA LOCATION D’UN APPARTEMENT MEUBLÉ</p>Internet haute vitesse avec accès sécuriséClimatiseur (installé durant la période estivale)Télévision par câble, téléphone avec ligne directe, radioChauffage, eau chaude et électricitéCuisinière, réfrigérateur et four à micro-ondesCafetière, grille-pain, bouilloire, vaisselle, chaudrons et poêlesLiterie et sèche-cheveuxFer et planche à repasserÉquipements pour enfantsChangement de serviettes aux deux jours (VIP)Service de ménage une fois par semaine pour les séjours de 14 jours et plus (VIP)<p>L’immeuble est doté de tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour vous détendre, demeurer en forme et pour vous faciliter la vie concernant les tâches quotidiennes comme la lessive, les courses, ou les rencontres d’affaires et d’agrément.</p><p>LES INSTALLATIONS DE L’IMMEUBLE</p>Piscine intérieure au sel, sauna et salle de conditionnementTerrasse sur le toit avec vue panoramique de MontréalLavoir automatique (carte à puce disponible)Guichet automatique à l’entréeCoffret de sécurité à la réceptionSalon lounge avec écran géant et feu de foyer central (rez-de-chaussée)Système de surveillance (caméras vidéo) et surveillé en tout temps par un gardien de nuit**les prix varient entre 1560 et 2220$ POur plus de renseignements et pour visiter/reserver l'appartement contactez nous au 514-843-3971 ou info@trylon.ca

item.title: Appartements meublés - location d'un mois et + au centre ville
item.address: 4660 Grand, Montreal, QC, Canada, H4B 2X
item.description: Address: 4660 Grand, Montreal, QC, Canada, H4B 2X <p>Tous nos grands et formidables appartements meublés sont dotés d’une cuisine et de deux salles de bain entièrement équipées, de deux grandes chambres intimes, accès à Internet haute vitesse, piscine, sauna, ainsi que tous les conforts requis pour un séjour des plus agréables. Économisez également sur les frais de restaurants en tirant avantage de nos cuisines entièrement équipées.</p><p>SERVICES INCLUS DANS LA LOCATION D’UN APPARTEMENT MEUBLÉ – 1400, AVENUE DES PINS OUEST</p><p>Un grand salon<br />Deux chambres privées<br />Salle-à-dîner</p>Deux salles de bain completesVue spectaculaire de votre appartementGrande cuisine équipée avec cuisinière, réfrigérateur, four à micro-ondes et lave-vaisselleBalconChauffage et eau chaudeAir climatiséCâble, Internet haute vitesse et téléphone (appels locaux)<p>L’immeuble est doté de tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour vous détendre, demeurer en forme et pour vous faciliter la vie.</p><p>LES INSTALLATIONS DE L’IMMEUBLE – 1400, AVENUE DES PINS OUEST</p>Piscine intérieure au sel, sauna et salle de conditionnementTerrasse sur le toit avec vue majestueuse du Mont-Royal et du centre-villeLavoir automatique (carte à puce disponible)Système de surveillance (caméras vidéo) et surveillé en tout temps par un gardien de nuit.Stationnement intérieur disponible ($)<p>Imaginez vivre sur le flanc sud du Mont-Royal dans un des plus chic quartiers de Montréal, à l’angle des avenues Cedar et des Pins, dans de grands appartements meublés d’une à quatre chambres à coucher et une vue panoramique de toute beauté sur la montagne et le centre-ville.</p><p>LES AVANTAGES DE VIVRE DANS CET UNIVERS ENCHANTEUR – 1400, AVENUE DES PINS OUEST</p>À proximité d’un parc à chien;À proximité de sentiers enchanteurs pour marcher, courir, faire du ski de fond et autres loisirs de plein airÀ proximité de l’Université McGill et l’Université ConcordiaÀ proximité de l’Hôpital Général de Montréal, de l’Hôpital Royal Victoria et du ShrinersÀ quelques minutes de marche des activités culturelles (le Musée de Beaux Arts et du « nightlife » montréalais)<p>***Les prix varient entre 2800 et 3500 $ selon la durée du séjour et la saison***<br />Tel 438-838-2441<br />Email location@trylon.ca</p>

item.title: Newmarket - Lofty Ideal! HeritageSuite
item.address: 27 High Park Blvd, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6R 1M6
item.description: Address: 27 High Park Blvd, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6R 1M6 Definitely NOT a basement!  <br /> <br />Extra-large and wonderful third-floor one-bedroom apartment in a 1904 Bay and Gable beauty.  <br /> <br />Walk up original oak staircase with leaded-glass windows to full 8ft ceilings and eclectic knee-walls, original oak trim, bright, sash windows, extra-large “eat-in” kitchen with full-size fridge and stove. Four-piece bathroom has brand new soaker tub and private in-suite laundry. Living room has lots of room for luxurious furniture, as well as an office “nook”. Bedroom has a large closet, and a bird’s eye view of the world.  <br /> <br />On a quiet one-way street in Heritage Newmarket, this unit is steps to upscale restaurants, eclectic eateries, boutiques, and cafes, Riverwalk Commons with its Winter Ice Lounge and beloved Seasonal Farmers' Market, hiking and biking trails, tennis courts, library, and “new” Old Town Hall / Town Square redevelopment. Centrally located: only 6 blocks to Southlake hospital to the northeast, 5 blocks to the Regional Offices and Courthouse to the west, and 4 blocks to the Municipal Offices to the south. It’s unquestionably the best neighbourhood in town…that’s why they built it first!  <br /> <br />$1250 including heat, hydro, water, private in-suite laundry, parking for two, and heritage charm.  <br />Professional snow removal and yard care also included.  <br />No pets or smokers please.  <br /> <br />To BOOK A SHOWING, Go to HeritageSuite.com  <br />Click on the book a showing link.  <br />Please state the title Lofty Ideal, and suggest convenient dates and times for viewing.  <br />Priority given to earliest received and complete forms.‎

item.description: Address: 1160 Rue Saint Mathieu, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3H 2P Apartment for Rent in Montreal<br/><br/>Key Property Details<br/>EARLY MOVE-IN INCENTIVE!* *call for detailsIndoor Swimming Pool on the RoofUtilities and A/C included in rent<br/>Property Features<br/>Air ConditioningCable ReadyElevatorFridge / StoveLaundry RoomParkingPoolSecurity CamerasStorageUtilities Included<br/>Detailed Property Information<br/>Downtown… Panoramic View – Comfort <br> <br> Located in the renowned downtown core of Montreal on St. Mathieu Street, at the corner of René-Lévesque Boulevard, Place Dorchester is at the heart of a district surrounded by heritage as well as modern architectural buildings. <br> <br> Place Dorchester offers a host of advantages. You can enjoy the indoor swimming pool on the roof while admiring the panoramic view of downtown Montreal. Place Dorchester offers the benefit of interior parking for your car. In addition, our managerial team on location, oversees your comfort and security 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. <br> <br> Ste. Catherine Street is right nearby at the heart of commercial and business activity downtown featuring the cultural, social and intellectual hub of the city which you can truly enjoy. Universities, restaurants, museums, cinemas, theatres can meet with your greatest expectations...at a stone’s throw…and all this within a short walk. The bus and metro at your door allow you to go rapidly where you wish. For your weekend outings or getting to your workplace, the Ville-Marie turnpike is but a few streets away. <br> <br> Let us tempt you with Place Dorchester and do not hesitate to contact us by phone at (514) 933-6771 or by e-mail at Nadia Zhani<br/><br/><br/>Additional Property Information<br/>Utilities and A/C included in rentCeramic tiling in washroomsFridge and stove are furnishedOn-site laundry facilitiesRecycling program availableParking availableStorage availableVideo surveillancePanoramic viewIndoor swimming pool with terraceComfortable apartments with modern featuresBright living area with lots of window spaceFreshly painted unitsParquet or carpet floorsCloset space

item.description: Address: 129 Oak Park Ave, East York, ON, Canada, M4C 4M7 Definitely NOT a basement!  <br /> <br />Beautiful sunny one-bedroom apartment on main floor of this 1875 Victorian Gothic gabled charmer. ‎ <br /> <br />Walk in to huge east-and north-facing windows in kitchen/living room, soaring 10-foot ceilings, original hardwood floors with 8-inch baseboards. West-facing windows in bedroom and 4-piece bathroom catch the evening sun all year round. Built-in cupboards and deep closets provide needed storage space. Private covered entrance and front BBQ stoop. Private in-suite laundry.  <br /> <br />On a quiet one-way street in Historic Newmarket, this unit is steps to library, shops and cafes, fine dining, Nokidaa walking and biking trails, parks and recreational facilities, spin studio, hot yoga, Seasonal Farmers' Market, and Riverwalk Commons. It's the absolute best neighbourhood in town, that's why they built it first!  <br /> <br />Centrally located, only 5 blocks to Southlake Regional Healthcare Facility to the east, Courthouse and Regional Offices to the west, and Municipal Offices to the south.  <br /> <br />$1055 includes all heat, hydro, water, in-suite laundry, and heritage charm!  <br />Professional yard care and snow removal also included.  <br /> <br />SUITS ONLY ONE PERSON with parking for one car only  <br /> <br />No pets or smokers, please.  <br /> <br />To BOOK A SHOWING go to HeritageSuite.com.  <br />Click on the Book a Showing link. item.description: Address: 5651 Ogilvie Street, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3H 1B <p>Ogilvie boasts a picturesque and quiet location in the south end of Halifax, just steps away from beautiful Point Pleasant Park.</p><p>It is close to SMU, DAL and Hospitals, located near Metro Transit route and within walking distance of downtown Halifax, where you will find theatres, dining and shopping. item.description: Address: 7315 Yellowhead Trail, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T5B 4K This lovely upper unit 2 bedroom coach home is located in a quiet complex and is close to schools, parks, shopping, and transit. The Henday is nearby for an easy commute. <br /> <br />The master bedroom has a large walk through closet into the spacious washroom. The second bedroom is a great size for kids or as a spare room/office. The washroom has been updated with a new vanity and fixtures. This condo comes with in-suite laundry with side by side washer & dryer. <br /> <br />The kitchen has also been updated with new cupboards and counter tops. A large pantry is just a few steps away. Kitchen appliances include a fridge, dishwasher and stove. <br /> <br />The dining room and living room are an open concept and great for entertaining. The living room has a wood burning fireplace for those chilly winter nights. <br /> <br />Step outside onto your second story patio where you will find ample storage in the attached storage room. Privacy is supplied by a lovely large tree. <br /> <br />Utilities are extra. Additional charges may apply for pets. 1 month security deposit. <br /> <br />Please call to make an appointment to view. item.title: Belle maison métro sauvé
item.address: 806 Cherrier, Plateau, QC, Canada, H2L1H4
item.description: Address: 806 Cherrier, Plateau, QC, Canada, H2L1H4 Profitez-en payez $1200 de loyer au lieu de $1500 à partir du 1er MARS jusqu'à 30 JUIN. on demande moins parce qu'on a acheté une maison et on doit démenager le 1er mars. Alors on fait une offre special et on paie la balance de $300 mensuels jusqu'à le mois de juin. Après ça, si vous voulez renouveler le contrat vous pouvez le faire avec le propietaire. C'est une très belle maison d'un étage avec 2 chambres + 1 solarium comme bureau,1 salle de bain, 1 salle de lavage, cuisine et salle à manger. Animaux acceptés petits ou gros. Il n'y a pas de sous-sol. Stationnement double juste pour la maison. Situé à 30 sec du métro sauvé et 1 min du train de banlieu. Le parc ahuntsic est à quelque pas ainsi que la place fleury. LE CEGEP Ahuntsic et Grasset sont très prêts. <br />La cour arrière sera vous charmer avec ses quelques 4000 pc de superficie. Il y a des framboisiers à vous couper le souffle, un super coin jardin, deux arbres fruitiers comestibles soit un cerisier et poirier...avec un patio sur 3 niveaux pour vous assurer du bon temps de repos à Montréal... <br />La maison a été rénové depuis plus de 17 ans et tout est impeccable. <br />contactez Manuel: 514-575-21-69 ou Alexandra: 514-574-04-91

item.description: Address: 501 Pacific St, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 2X6 Next showing: TBA <br />Please text 604-375-3388 to book your timeslot. Appointments available outside of weekly open house times. <br /> <br />17th floor -- 888 Pacific Street, Vancouver, BC, V6Z 2S6 ("Pacific Promenade") <br /> <br />DESCRIPTION <br />Pacific Promenade is located in one of downtown Vancouver's most sought after neighbourhoods. Enjoy complete privacy and serenity in this top floor corner unit with north and east exposures, and a 20-foot long balcony. Newly renovated kitchen features beautiful new high quality solid wood "Alabaster" white Kitchen Craft cabinets with pantry rollout drawers, pot drawers, Italian "Earth Glitter" granite counters, 4 new SS appliances (fridge has icemaker) and a new open concept layout. Main bathroom features new tub with new seamless shower walls/ceiling. Master Bedroom features walk-in closet, ensuite, and access to balcony. Apartment is freshly painted throughout with HW and ceramic floors. Large storage room in unit. Includes one heated, secure underground parking spot and car-washing bays. Enjoy the abundant amenties in this well-managed/maintained building in the "Northwest One" complex, including a large indoor heated saltwater swimming pool, sauna, gym, tennis courts, library, games rooms, outdoor shuffle board, and woodworking shop. On the Ottawa River bike/walking paths. 5 minute walk to Britannia Beach, Farm Boy, Metro, Shopper's Drug Mart, and OC Transpo routes. "Resort" living with plentiful recreational opportunities, beautiful park space, Mud Lake nature sanctuary, and lots of activities to enjoy socializing with friendly neighbours! item.title: 9640 105 St - Beautiful Condo for rent in Rossdale!
item.address: 151 Edwards Drive, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6X 1N
item.description: Address: 151 Edwards Drive, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6X 1N <p>***SIGN A LEASE ANYTIME IN FEBRUARY AND GET THE REST OF FEBRUARYS RENT FREE WHEN A ONE YEAR LEASE IS SIGNED!!!***<br /><br />Welcome home to your beautiful condo Downtown!!!</p><p> </p><p>Soak in the beautiful scenery of Edmonton's downtown neighborhood - Rossdale.</p><p> </p><p>This beautiful condo has everything you need. As you walk into the entrance you are greeted with warm colors that make you feel right at home.</p><p> </p><p>Just down the hall you will enter in to your beautiful kitchen with new appliances. A wrap around island gives you all the counter space and cupboards you need - a chef's dream! Enjoy making a dinner for your family or baking all your favorite treats.</p><p> </p><p>Just to your left is your spacious living room, with beautiful deep brown hardwood and even a fireplace! Curl up on your comfy couch watching your favorite movie, or recline in your Lazyboy to watch the big game! Endless possibilities!</p><p> </p><p>You also have two large bedrooms. Feel the toes sink into your carpet. Climb into bed, and have the best sleep of your life! Your master bedroom has a beautiful in suite bathroom. All the privacy you need!</p><p> </p><p>You have a beautiful three piece bathroom with a nice soaker tub. Take a nice relaxing bath after a hard day of work. You also have your own laundry. No more sharing or worrying about having the change - it's all yours!</p><p></p><p>Keep warm in those winter months with an underground parking stall! No more battling with scraping your windshield from that Canadian frost. You also have underground storage as well. More than enough space for you and your family!</p><p></p><p>Keep warm in the winter, and keep cold in the summer! The unit is equipped with its own state of the line air conditioner!</p><p> </p><p>Near by grocery stores: Rosedale foods, Carlton Grocery, & Alberta First Grocery & Deli</p><p>Near by coffee shops: Starbucks, Tim Hortons, & Good Earth Cafe</p><p>Near by parks: MINUTES AWAY FROM THE RIVER VALLEY!!</p><p>Near by Nightlife: The Common, Brixx Bar & Grill, & Cask & Barrel</p><p> </p><p>With a walk score of 81 and a transit score of 77, you can get anywhere you need with the conveniently located unit. Don't miss out! Reply today!!</p><p> </p><p>Application approval contingent upon credit check, employment and references.</p><p> </p><p>Heat and water included. Pay power only.</p><p> </p><p>Contact LLR Canada via e mail to book your showing appointment today! *******Due to the high volume of calls we recommend you e mail your inquiry****</p>

item.address: 175 Sherbrooke St West, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2X 1X
item.description: Address: 175 Sherbrooke St West, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2X 1X This apartment is located on the 12th floor with a balcony to enjoy an amazing view of Mont Royal. It was completely renovated in September 2015 so everything (floors, paint, kitchen counters/ cabinets, bathroom etc) has been recently redone meaning no work will be required prior to moving in. The price includes ALL utilities (except internet). I am looking for someone to take over a year long lease beginning ideally on May 1st (this can be negotiated if necessary). It is a great apartment and fairly priced for the location. There is a laundry room in the basement, as well as a convenience store and pizza shop located at the front entrance of the building. It is about a 5-10 minute walk to McGill, 5 minutes to St. Laurent and St. Catherine. Don't miss out! Please contact me if you have any questions. Thank you.

item.description: Address: 1100 8 AVe SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3T Available Mar 1. 1200sq feet. Included in rent: all utilities, TV, wireless internet, laundry, 1 garage space, private entrance. Many renovations with high end finishings, large 2 person granite rainfall shower with multiple heads. Reno's are still being completed and will be done for the begining of March. If they are not finished rent will be reduced for a period of time. Bathroom and kitchen area are new. Very spacious living room with dry bar, large single bedroom with walk in closet. Very quite and safe street, parking available, 1 garage sport, 1 driveway spot as well as street parking. Storage space for bikes and boxes if needed. Fish creek a short walk away! <br />Emails preferred <br />Curtis

item.title: Charm filled ATWATER MARKET Apartment - Available March 1st 2016
item.address: 8220 ONTARiO, Mercier, QC, Canada, H1L 3e
item.description: Address: 8220 ONTARiO, Mercier, QC, Canada, H1L 3e Beautiful 5 1/2 unit downtown montreal on coveted tree lined street, Rue du Souvenir! <br /><br />This unit is roughly 1200 square feet has a massive bedroom, large guest bedroom and a third bedroom/office just off the kitchen. The apartment is on the main floor of a Victorian house and it occupies the entire floor, it has an entrance at the front of the house and one at the back with a beautiful deck, optimal for some sun tanning over the summer! <br /><br />Apartment features:<br />-1200 square feet, I know I already mentioned it but it needs repeating!!!<br />-High ceilings throughout the apartment, roughly 12 ft. <br />-Brick wall throughout - Original brick wall with the cutest little cat prints (on a few spots) on it from when the bricks were shaped.<br />-Massive living room<br />-Recently renovated kitchen with all appliances<br />- Appliances: fridge, stove, dishwasher, ensuite washer and dryer<br />-beautiful glass shower<br />-lots of storage space in the apartment and little closet on the back deck<br />-super friendly and chill landlords (married couple). They truly are amazing, if you have any issues at all they fix it the next day. We had problems with our dishwasher and washing machine, they replaced both within a few days.<br />- Parking spot out back at no extra charge<br /><br />Neighborhood:<br />- The apartment is located on a beautiful tree lined street that looks idyllic in the summer. The street is a private little strip off Atwater, very quiet and the neighbors are amazing.<br />- 15 minute walk to Mount Royal park, I took advantage of the vicinity of the part all summer. Beautiful hike in the park highly preferable to the gym<br />-5 minute walk to Alexis Nihon mall, energie cardio gym, grocery stores (IGA and Adonis)<br />- 10 minute walk to Atwater market, super C grocery store, SAQ<br />- very close to downtown, I have timed it, it is a 12 minute walk from the house to the eaton center downtown. 15 to 20 if you are a slow walker.<br /><br />The lease: <br />My boyfriend and I have been living in this stunning unit for a year and a half now, we LOVE the apartment and the landlord. Sadly we are moving back to Ontario for work reasons and are looking for someone to take over our lease come March 1st.<br />The lease ends July 1st 2016 so you have a total of 3 months left on the lease after which you can renew for another year (the landlord would be thrilled) or move elsewhere.<br /><br />Rent price - 1,500 + Utilities this place is a STEAL for that price considering all of the features.<br /><br />email me if you are interested in having a look at the apartment.<br /><br />This place won't last! And you will love the cat prints!!

item.description: Address: 26 Lancaster Terrace NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T5X 5S4 Opportunity in a convenient area to rent or rent to own!<br />Optional to sign a 6 months/1 year contract or pay month-to-month.<br />A basement suite similar to a bilevel in Shalimar Plaza located across the street from Capilano mall, multiple restaurants and the Capilano bus terminal is right outside the front door as well as many trails and parks to enjoy the rivervalley views. Convenient bus routes include direct busses to the university, whyte ave (that run until 3am), downtown and west Edmonton mall. Open floor plan offers an extremely spacious living room, generous master bedroom with a walk in closet, full bath with window for excess light, and an efficient kitchen with a spacious closet for storage. Heat, water and 1 outdoor parking stall with plugins and plenty of street parking included in rent. Will be upgrading the paint job within the next few weeks, will be available for viewing as soon as Feb.15 (might still be undergoing a paint job), possession as soon as March 1st.<br />Security deposit: Same as rent<br />Rent may also include a loft bed for small families/single parents/storage and a portable dishwasher that connects to sink if requested.<br />Furnished: 1000 (furnishings include queen bed, loft bed, etc. will be discussed if needed)<br />If tenant stays for at least one year, all furniture provided can be taken with you when you leave. item.description: Address: 2711 James Mowatt Trail SW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6W 3B This is a great apartment located in sought after Maureen Manor. (9927 114 Street) There is usually a waiting list for these units as the are big, bright and well maintained. <br /> <br />Spacious Corner Unit with balcony and amazing views. You can even see the Northern Lights sometimes! <br /> <br />I'm looking for someone to sublet until the end of my lease which is May 30th, 2016. You have the option of renewing for 6 months or 12 months after that. <br /> <br />The building management company Boardwalk will approve the new tenant. They will require an application which includes details of employment, references and a credit check. <br /> <br />Now about the unit itself! <br />The building is adult only and is very quiet. <br />Laundry on this floor. <br />Corner unit with big window in kitchen (north) and there is another window in the bedroom (west) and balcony with huge windows (west) <br />4 piece bathroom <br />Separate Bedroom <br />Lots of storage in unit and also a storage unit outside the unit. <br />The rent covers the heat and water. Electricity is paid by tenant and I usually pay around $30 a month. <br />There is street parking or you can discuss with the property manager about a parking spot. <br />Pet Policy. With approval they allow cats. The fee per month is $25. <br /> <br />Will require first and last months rent. <br />As an incentive the unit will be vacant on the 22nd of March so you can move in early with no additional costs. (BONUS for You!!) <br /> <br />Also selling the bedroom furniture and sofa in living room. Ask me more! <br /> <br />Thank you!
